meanings.definition: A digital image of the contents of a computer or mobile device screen.
meanings.sent1: I took screenshots of my favorite game to show my friends.
meanings.sent2: The screenshots on my phone help me remember important information.
meanings.sent3: My cat accidentally stepped on the keyboard and took screenshots of random things.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a series of screenshots, capturing moments in perfect detail.
meanings.sent5: The screenshots of the crime scene provided crucial evidence for the investigation.

meanings.definition: To capture a screenshot of a computer or mobile device screen.
meanings.sent1: Can you teach me how to screenshots on my laptop?
meanings.sent2: She screenshots funny memes to share with her friends.
meanings.sent3: He screenshots every message just in case he forgets something important.
meanings.sent4: The photographer screenshots the stunning sunset before it disappears.
meanings.sent5: I quickly screenshots the recipe before the webpage refreshed.
